project.name: J-C606A-ELAS-05-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF19-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.

iopair.name: J-C606A-ELAS-05-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Add data Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: J-C606A-ELAS-05-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF19-01-GOOD-04
iopair.description: add data Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND (STATE-EXISTS AND STATE-HAS-CONTENT) AND (GLOBAL-EXISTS AND GLOBAL-HAS-CONTENT) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

if [[ -s good-05/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-5 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C606A-ELAS-05-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF19-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: drilling down Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_nVlRlb0nkQnVocThUuXC AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_QgEvEpD6rJ OR (NOT (finished_RjEvtHNwNw AND finished_pZZ0MYk7at) AND NOT (controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T OR continued_execution_50UMYrycnq)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_QgEvEpD6rJ OR (NOT (finished_RjEvtHNwNw AND finished_pZZ0MYk7at) AND NOT (controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T OR continued_execution_50UMYrycnq))) OR controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_QgEvEpD6rJ OR (NOT (finished_RjEvtHNwNw AND finished_pZZ0MYk7at) AND NOT (controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T OR continued_execution_50UMYrycnq)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_QgEvEpD6rJ OR (NOT (finished_RjEvtHNwNw AND finished_pZZ0MYk7at) AND NOT (controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T OR continued_execution_50UMYrycnq))) OR controlled_exit_FN0vibSD2T))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
